languages.text: "В таком случае стоило поставить в известность нас. Иначе добыча может случайно свернуть шею прежде, чем западня захлопнется".
"If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае стоило поставить в известность нас. Иначе добыча может случайно свернуть шею прежде, чем западня захлопнется".

traits.locale_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might accidentally snap its neck before the trap can slam shut."
"If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might accidentally snap its neck before the trap can slam shut."
"If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might accidentally snap its neck before the trap can slam shut."
"If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."
"If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."

languages.text: "Wenn dem so ist, hätte man uns informieren müssen. Ansonsten bricht sich die Beute noch das Genick, ehe die Falle zuschnappen kann."
languages.original_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn dem so ist, hätte man uns informieren müssen. Ansonsten bricht sich die Beute noch versehentlich das Genick, ehe die Falle zuschlagen kann."

languages.text: « Si tel est le cas, nous aurions dû en être informés. Autrement, la proie risque de se briser le cou avant que ledit piège ait le temps de se refermer. »
languages.original_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."

traits.locale_text: « Si tel est le cas, nous aurions dû en être informés. Autrement, la proie risque de se briser accidentellement le cou avant que ledit piège ait le temps de se refermer. »

languages.text: «Si es así, debería avisarnos, no sea que la presa acabe con el cuello roto antes de que la trampa pueda cerrarse».
languages.original_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."

traits.locale_text: «Si es así, debería avisarnos, no sea que la presa le rompa el cuello antes de que la trampa pueda cerrarse».

languages.text: 「もしそうなら、一言あっても良いはずだ。そうしないと、罠が閉じる前に獲物の首をへし折ってしまうかもしれないからな」
languages.original_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."

traits.locale_text: 「もしそうなら、一言あっても良いはずよ。そうしないと、罠が閉まる前に獲物が誤って首を折ってしまうかもしれないわ」

languages.text: “如果是这样的话，我们应当提前得到通知，否则猎物可能会在落入陷阱之前就扭断脖子。”
languages.original_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."

traits.locale_text: “如果是这样的话，我们应当提前得到通知，否则猎物可能会在落入陷阱之前就不小心扭断脖子。”

languages.original_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."

languages.text: "Durum buysa bize haber verilmesi gerekirdi. Aksi takdirde avımız, güzelce tuzağa düşmeden önce kendini boynu kırık yatarken bulacak."
languages.original_text: "If that is the case, then we should have been informed. Otherwise, the prey might find its neck snapped before the trap can slam shut."
